faq.title: Contact Seller
faq.description: Contacting the Seller is the basic thing one can expect from a E-Commerce Website.We are pleasd to act as a medium between the Buyer and Seller. We ensure to provide a nice community to buy or sell bikes.
pointsTobenoted: You can contact the seller directly by clicking on their name in ad listing page
Once you have reached to them they will provide all necessary information about your product
If there is any issue with delivery of products then buyers should report it through the messaging option provided.
If there is any issue with payment then we would request for a refund
Please note that if buyers are not satisfied after receiving feedback from seller than it's our responsibility and policy to take action against those unhappy customers
